author: cutting
msg: Reduce iteration through all map & reduce tasks to improve jobtracker performance.

author: maxb
msg: Fix broken UUID timestamp generation. Code was already present to convert a
unix timestamp to a DCE/RFC4122 UUID timestamp (which uses a different
granularity and epoch-start), but it was not being used.
use apr_uint64_t to handle time values throughout.

author: sandymac
msg: Updated BaseObjectPools and unit tests to conform to the Pool 2.0 contract changes.
* getNumIdle/getNumActive now return a negative value when unsupported.
* calling close() more than once no longer throws an exception.

author: mbo
msg: JDO-319: Enhance api20 XMLTest so that users can check their own .jdo .orm, and .jdoquery files

author: jkuhnert
msg: fixed unit tests for ibm jre
